sn48.68:4.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ rukkhā, pārichattako tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
sn48.68:4.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.68:4.5: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
sn48.68:4.9: paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
sn48.68:4.10: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ rukkhā, pārichattako tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
sn48.68:4.11: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
